name: express-bookings
description: Your REST API for managing bookings

scripts.test-negative: newman run "./postman/collections/Bookings API Negative.json" -e "./postman/environments/Local.postman_environment.json" && npm run sentry:sourcemaps
scripts.test: npm run test-positive && npm run test-negative && npm run sentry:sourcemaps && npm run sentry:sourcemaps
scripts.sentry:sourcemaps: sentry-cli sourcemaps inject --org none-ke7 --project back-end-final-project c/:Gebruiker/gojer/Winc/Back-end Final Project && sentry-cli sourcemaps upload --org none-ke7 --project back-end-final-project c/:Gebruiker/gojer/Winc/Back-end Final Project
